external_games.name: Ore no Imouto ga Konna ni Kawaii Wake ga Nai Portable ga Tsuzuku Wake ga Nai
Ore no Imouto ga Konna ni Kawaii Iwake Ganai: Portable ga Tsudzuku Wake Ganai

name: Ore no Imouto ga Konna ni Kawaii Wake ga Nai Portable ga Tsuzuku Wake ga Nai
storyline:
The story of Ore no Imouto P-Zoku follows the story of the light novels, continuing from where the story in Ore no Imouto Portable ended.

Each of the story routes featuring the main characters assume that the player reaches the point where in Kyousuke Kousaka has started a romantic relation with one of the main characters, and follows through the story.

New characters were introduced, including Kanako Kurusu's older sister Kanata and Saori Bajeena's older sister Kaori, which both debuted in the light novels as well.
summary: Ore no Imouto ga Konna ni Kawaii Wake ga Nai Portable ga Tsuzuku Wake ga Nai is an expanded version of the comedy romantic visual novel Ore no Imouto ga Konna ni Kawaii Wake ga Nai Portable. It includes two discs with the first being an updated version of the original game and a second disc with additional elements added in.
